name: E-Run 2.0 Script File
summary: Learn about .EBS2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: EBS2 files cannot be reverted to the original ES2 experiment design file. This is so the script can be distributed without revealing the intellectual property in the design.
NOTE: EBS2 files are the successor to .EBS files used in E-Prime version 1.

description: Script executed by E-Run, a program included with E-Prime experimentation software; saves an executable experiment that was generated from a design (.ES2 file); enables psychology experiments to be run standalone using E-Run.
